body: hey , i won a Diamond rank on avicus 1 month ago , and i didnt have it, i asked Kylo on slack but he didnt answer me , i asked all the seniors but the only way is "tell it to kylo" but he didnt answer , also ViceWatercolour have the proofs.

title: When i will get my diamond rank...

replies.body: Well you really need to ask Kylo because seniors don't have permission to give donator ranks to players, we can only transfer them from player to player. If your having trouble contacting him i'd be more then happy to talk to him on your behalf and sort this out.
